name: Monster Disco (Ludum Dare 33)
description:
Monstrous rhythm arcade. 

You came from the music depths of distant space, and your appetite appeals you in rhythm of hunger. 
Eat everything at your path, making steps in beat. 
Destroy everything you see - nothing can stop you, and eat juicy meat. 
Defeat soldiers, annihilates tanks and dodge from space-beam attacks. 

All music, art and code was made during LudumDare 33.

 Specially for the itch.io in June 2017 we did an update version with a few changes in the gameplay.

We tried to build the WEB version, but due to the strange engine we have failed. It goes completely unplayable.

From FourQuarters https://twitter.com/_FQteam
